TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PictureBoxSizeMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how an image is positioned within a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property. To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode AutoSize = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The is sized equal to the size of the image that it contains.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode CenterImage = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The image is displayed in the center if the is larger than the image. If the image is larger than the , the picture is placed in the center of the and the outside edges are clipped.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode Normal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The image is placed in the upper-left corner of the . The image is clipped if it is larger than the it is contained in.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode StretchImage = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The image within the is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode Zoom = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The size of the image is increased or decreased maintaining the size ratio.
